definition: to fast or abstain from meat, wine etc/vegetarian diet/study room/building/to give alms (to a monk)

sentences.english: But remember this auspicious month comes but once a year.
sentences.chinese: 但要记得，吉庆的斋月，每年只有一次。

sentences.english: Families and communities share the happiness of gathering together for iftar and prayers.
sentences.chinese: 亲朋好友欢聚一堂，共享斋月晚餐并共同祈祷。

sentences.english: Women pray together at the edge of the tip at the end of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 斋月结束之际妇女们一起聚在垃圾场的边上祈祷。

sentences.english: Noora's younger sister Nadia is trying to start fasting this Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 努勒的妹妹纳迪试着在今年斋月开始封斋。

sentences.english: Muslims around the world are marking the start of Islam's holy month of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 世界各地的穆斯林纪念伊斯兰神圣的拉马丹斋月开始。

sentences.english: Muslim man prayed during at a mosque in Malaga, southern Spain, Monday.
sentences.chinese: 斋月，一名穆斯林男子在马拉加的一间清真寺内祷告。

sentences.english: Ramadan changed the working pattern of Muslim restaurants in Itaewon.
sentences.chinese: 斋月改变了梨泰院穆斯林餐厅的工作模式。

sentences.english: During Ramadan, Muslims awaken long before the pre-dawn call to prayer.
sentences.chinese: 在斋月期间，穆斯林早在黎明前便起床祷告。

sentences.english: Ramadan is a festive time that is anticipated for months by Muslims everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 莱麦丹斋月是各地穆斯林连月盼望的节庆日子。

sentences.english: Ramadan teaches Muslims self-discipline, humility and giving.
sentences.chinese: 斋月让人们懂得自律，仁慈和施舍。

sentences.english: A food bazaar in Malaysia during month of Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 斋月期间的马来西亚食品集市。

sentences.english: Muslim worshippers circle the Kaaba at Mecca's Grand Mosque during Ramadan.
sentences.chinese: 斋月期间，聚集在麦加大清真寺外的穆斯林朝圣者。
虔诚的穆斯林准时地遵守斋月。

sentences.english: May Allah reward you and grant you forgiveness in this blessed month.
sentences.chinese: 愿安拉奖赏你，在这个尊贵吉庆的斋月宽恕你。

sentences.english: Tarik Ramadan, professor of Contemporary Islamic Studies at Oxford University agrees.
sentences.chinese: 塔里克斋月，当代伊斯兰研究教授，牛津大学同意。

sentences.english: I think back to my very first Ramadhan, way back before Islam.
sentences.chinese: 回想起我归信伊斯兰之前最初的一个斋月。

definition: fast (in several religions)/Ramadan (Islam)/see also 齋月|斋月[Zhai1 yue4]
Eid al-Fitr or Feast of Breaking the Fast, celebrated on the last day of Ramadan
to stop following a vegetarian diet/to break a fast
see 古爾邦節|古尔邦节[Gu3 er3 bang1 jie2]
jummah or Friday, when Muslims gather to attend prayers (loanword from Arabic)
Eid al-Adha or Festival of the Sacrifice (Qurban), celebrated on the 10th day of the 12th month of the Islamic calendar
Lent (Christian period of forty days before Easter)
Hanukkah (Chanukah), 8 day Jewish holiday starting on the 25th day of Kislev (can occur from late Nov up to late Dec on Gregorian calendar)/also called 哈努卡節|哈努卡节 and simply 哈努卡
